actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To extend until January 1, 1997, the previously existing suspension of duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on: (1) 4-chloro-2-nitroaniline; (2) 4-chloro,5-dimethoxyaniline; (3) 3,4-diaminophenetole, dihydrogen sulfate; and (4) 6-hydroxy-2-napthoic acid.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1997, the previously existing suspension of duty on certain chemicals.
